welcome:
🎬 Welcome to Video Bot!

Send me a video code to get your video.

📋 Available commands:
• /help - Show help
• /language - Change language
• /feedback - Send feedback
help_text:
📋 Help:

🎯 How to use:
• Send a video code to get your video
• Make sure you're subscribed to required channels

🔧 Commands:
• /language - Change language
• /feedback - Send feedback or complaint
• /help - Show this help
subscribe_first: 📢 Please subscribe to our channels first to use the bot:
not_subscribed: ❌ You must subscribe to all channels to use the bot.
video_not_found: ❌ Video not found. Please check your code and try again.
send_feedback:
💬 Please send your feedback or complaint:

(Send your message in the next message)
feedback_received: ✅ Thank you! Your feedback has been received and sent to administrators.
invalid_code: ❌ Invalid video code format. Please check and try again.
bot_error: ❌ An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
